certificatesIT.course: JS do básico ao avançado (c/ Node e Projetos)

certificatesDesign.course: Curso Completo de Design de Interface

jobExperiences.responsibilities: I participated in the migration of the “System Admin” system from RPGLE Modules to the WEB using React and contributed to the improvement of the company’s payment systems (GAPTS and MISC). I contributed to the improvement of the performance of requests to the Back-end through the analysis of the CloudIBM and Cirrus platforms. I worked on the analysis and correction of vulnerabilities related to Cookies, CORS, and PseudoRandom Number using SonarQube. I used React (Hooks, Redux, NextJS, Router, Axios, Context) as the main development tool. I built unit tests using Jest and performed test automation with Selenium. I prepared reports and test results in .Docx, .pdf, and .xls formats for presentation during meetings. I modernized the design of the web application using Carbon Design components. I was recognized for my effort, dedication, and commitment to work, as I did a good teamwork and solved tasks efficiently. I worked on the analysis and approval of Pull Requests (GitHub) in DEV, UAT, and PROD environments.

In my previous role, I handled diverse responsibilities, including manual VPN configuration for Windows, Linux, and Apple environments, remote access via RDP/VNC, and user reset/configuration in systems like Active Directory and Google Admin. I utilized Zabbix for monitoring, addressing issues like overheating and data security. This experience honed my analytical skills and adaptability. Reflecting on this experience, I am eager to bring my honed skills and insights to new projects, fostering growth and success.

In this role, I provided a comprehensive suite of audiovisual design and production services. This included creating logos, resumes, flyers, banners, and various other design assets. My expertise extended to video and audio editing, where I specialized in crafting engaging intros for YouTubers and web influencers, as well as producing reels, posts, and banners tailored for diverse social media platforms, notably Instagram. Furthermore, I actively contributed to UX/UI Design, offering visual services for web pages, pageland creations, and more. This experience has honed my creativity and equipped me with a versatile skill set.
